# isHidden

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the element is hidden.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isHidden: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. As an optimization, the collection view might not create the corresponding view when the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]. Because there might not be a view, hidden elements do not participate in hit testing for the collection view.

## Accessing the Layout Attributes

- **frame**: The frame rectangle of the element.
- **size**: The size of the element.
- **alpha**: The transparency of the element.
- **zIndex**: The element’s position on the z axis.
